example.eg: Mark's reaction to turning fifty was to go out and buy a sports car.
example.egtrans: 马克对自己满五十岁的反应是出门买了一辆运动跑车。

example.eg: Liam's quick reaction to the woman walking out into the road avoided a nasty accident.
example.egtrans: 利亚姆快速的本能反应救下了那位走向马路中间的女人，避免了一起惨烈车祸的发生。

example.eg: Alison had an allergic reaction to the drug.
example.egtrans: 艾莉森对药物有过敏反应。

example.eg: Mixing these two substances causes a reaction.
example.egtrans: 混合这两种物质会发生化学反应。

example.eg: In the blinding snow, one car hit another and caused a chain reaction; the accident ended up involving six cars on Highway 40.
The patient experienced a delayed reaction to the drug.
When I first heard about the project, my gut reaction was very negative because it didn't seem practical.
I admit my response was a knee-jerk reaction; when I thought about it later I wished I'd never said it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 本能反应, 下意识的反应
